T02D2265:33b-1: do ha ko sha n'a ma ts'a rya g'i ti aartha pra d'i pa n'a ma t'i k'a /

T02D2265:34a-0: @34a * // gzhan rnams rtsa ba'i rjes la 'grel pas 'chad //
T02D2265:34a-1: bdag lugs gdams ngag rjes la rtsabs 'ching //

T02D2265:34a-6: snod dang ldan pas mkha' 'gros byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2265:34a-7: spyod pa mdzad pas brda don thugs su chud //
T02D2265:34a-8: mtshan nyid rtogs pas mda' mkhan mo dang 'grogs //

T02D2265:34a-13: bsdus pa'i don ni nyi shu rtsa gsum gyis //
T02D2265:34a-14: gzhung gi don rnams mdor bsdus gsal bar byed //
T02D2265:34a-15: gzhung gi tshad ni tshigs bcad bzhi bcu yin //
T02D2265:34a-16: tshig rkang bzhi bzhis 'bru don gsal bar byed /
T02D2265:34a-18: // / de la re zhig rgyal po'i don du mgur
T02D2265:34a-19: du bzhengs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu pa
T02D2265:34a-20: 'di la don rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2265:34a-21: dang po bram ze chen po'i thugs dam la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D2265:34a-22: de'i gzhung rnams gsal bar bstan pa'o //
T02D2265:34a-23: de yang bram ze chen po'i thugs dam ni bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i sku bzhi yin te /
T02D2265:34a-24: de la bdud bzhi ni phung po'i bdud dang /
T02D2265:34a-28: de la phung po'i bdud ni /

T02D2265:34a-30: rnam par shes pa aa'i tshul du zhugs nas phung po grub pa ni phung po zhes bya la /
T02D2265:34a-31: phung po des sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po nyams su myong ba ni bdud ces bya'o //
T02D2265:34a-32: sdug bsngal gyi dbang du phung po gyur pas stobs che ba'o //
T02D2265:34a-34: pha ma gnyis kyi thig le dkar dmar gnyis ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa yin la /
T02D2265:34a-35: de la rnam shes aar zhugs pa ni /
T02D2265:34a-36: ma skye ba med pa las rkyen snang gi phung por grub kyang /
T02D2265:34a-37: phung po nyid med bzhin du sprul pas sgyu ma
T02D2265:34b-0: yin pa'i phyir sgyu @34b ma de la rlom sems
T02D2265:34b-1: dang bral ba'o // gang rlom sems dang bral ba
T02D2265:34b-2: ni don gyi lus 'gyur ba med cing rnam par

T02D2265:34b-4: dang bral ba'o // te / de nyid ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D2265:34b-5: sprul sku la bde ba dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa ci yang snang yang /
T02D2265:34b-6: nam mkha'i sprin pa gzhan du yal te 'gro ba'i phyir phung po'i bdud bcom pa'o //
T02D2265:34b-7: nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni phung po la brten nas dbang po lnga la chags /

T02D2265:34b-9: nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur nas de la spyod pa ni stobs che ba'o //
T02D2265:34b-10: de 'joms pa ni nyon mongs nyid dran pas chags sdang skyes pa yin la /
T02D2265:34b-11: dran pa nyid dran med las skyes pas //
T02D2265:34b-12: dran ma dran gnyis nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba yin pas /
T02D2265:34b-13: de'i phyir dran ma dran gnyis 'joms ba ni rkyen las skyes la //
T02D2265:34b-14: dran med kyang ltos pa'i chos yin te /
T02D2265:34b-15: de gnyis kas mtshan pa'i dus su ci yang mi

T02D2265:34b-25: // / phung po la brten pa'i dran pa 'di 'chi ba'i bdag po yin te /
T02D2265:34b-26: dran pa 'dis phung po mi 'dra ba du ma btsal nas //

T02D2265:34b-29: de 'joms pa ni phung po rkyen las skyes pa

T02D2265:35a-0: don gyi yid thos bsam bsgom gsum dang bral ba'i dbyings @35a * //

T02D2265:35a-17: de 'joms pa ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i bde

T02D2265:35a-26: lus zhig pa'i dus su lus la brten pa'i bde ba yang 'jig pa'o //
T02D2265:35a-27: zag pa med pa'i bde ba ni sku gsum gyi

T02D2265:35a-29: par dag pa / spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang bral ba'i dbyings de la ;

T02D2265:44b-6: yon tan la gsal mi gsal med de /

T02D2265:44b-8: dran pa la zhen pas mi rtogs /
T02D2265:44b-9: dran med rang la gsal mi gsal gyi tha snyad med /
T02D2265:44b-10: rtag mi rtag gi tha snyad med de /
T02D2265:44b-11: rin po che'i 'dam rdzab bkrus nas rin po cher shes pa dang 'dra bar /
T02D2265:44b-12: dran pa'i 'dam rdzab bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis /
T02D2265:44b-13: glo bur bar ngo bstan nas /
T02D2265:44b-14: dran med kyi dbyings su bkrus na sku gsum mthong la /
T02D2265:44b-15: dran pa'i 'dam rdzab ma bkrus na mi mthong bas /
T02D2265:44b-16: de yi 'od kyang gsal ba ma yin no /
T02D2265:44b-18: // / da ni 'gal ba'i dpe kun gzhi sa bon las /
T02D2265:44b-19: 'khor 'das gnyis su smin pa'i dpes sa bon gang yin pa las myu gu 'byung ba ston te /
T02D2265:44b-20: de yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dbang po sgo lnga la thim /
T02D2265:44b-21: dbang po yid kyi rnam par shes pa la thim /
T02D2265:44b-22: yid nyon mongs pa la thim /
T02D2265:44b-23: nyon mongs pa kun gzhi la thim nas /
T02D2265:44b-24: byas pa'i stong pa stong sang de bsgom pa de ni gti mug yin te /
T02D2265:44b-25: des don dam pa'i ye shes blo las 'das pa de mi gsal ba'i phyir /
T02D2265:44b-26: gti mug gsal bas ye shes mi gsal te /
T02D2265:44b-27: kha cig gis aom a'a:h'um gzigs la gcig la gcig thim nas /
T02D2265:44b-28: thig le lta bu'am thig le nyid kyang sgom par sgom pa de ye shes yin zer te /
T02D2265:44b-29: de ni yid kyis bcos pa'i phyir gti mug yin la /
T02D2265:44b-30: yang dbang gsum pa'i nyams myong la don gyi ye shes yin zer ba'am /
T02D2265:44b-31: phra mo dang sbom po dang bcos pa'i stong pa gang sgom yang /
T02D2265:44b-32: kun gzhi rnam par shes pas gti mug yin la /
T02D2265:44b-33: des khams gsum las mi grol bas sdug bsngal sna tshogs su smin pas /
T02D2265:44b-34: gti mug gsal bas sdug bsngal bsal ba yin /
T02D2265:44b-35: dper na sa bon gyi rgyu rtsa ba'am 'bras bu la sogs pa ma btab na mi skye la /
T02D2265:45a-0: @45a * // de bzhin du dang po rgyu ma rig pa de
T02D2265:45a-1: las kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de la dran
T02D2265:45a-2: pa rang rig pa byung bas /
T02D2265:45a-3: de ltar sa bon las ni myu gu 'byung //
T02D2265:45a-4: sa bon gyi rgyu de ma spyad na yal ga dang lo 'dab la sogs pa rgyas par 'gro //
T02D2265:45a-5: de bzhin kun gzhi rtsa ba ma chod na /
T02D2265:45a-6: 'khor ba'i bde sdug gi yal ga sna tshogs 'byung bas /
T02D2265:45a-7: myu gu'i rgyu las yal ga 'byung ba'o /
T02D2265:45a-9: // / da ni 'gal ba dran med skye med blo 'das rtogs kyang /
T02D2265:45a-10: snang ba dran pa la mngon par zhen pa'i dpe ni /
T02D2265:45a-11: mthong yang dong du mchongs pa lta bu ni /
T02D2265:45a-12: chos nyid rnal ma gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D2265:45a-13: ye shes sems nyid kyi dangs ma de la gtan
T02D2265:45a-14: tshigs sam / rig pa'i sgo nas gtan la dbab tu mi btub ste /
T02D2265:45a-15: de yang gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir yang rang bzhin med /
T02D2265:45a-16: zhen pa la sogs pa brjod kyang /
T02D2265:45a-17: don dam par rang bzhin med pa de ma rtogs pa'i phyir /
T02D2265:45a-18: gcig dang du mas sems la dpyad pa yis //
T02D2265:45a-19: don dam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dran pa med cing yid la byar med pa'i ngang du /
T02D2265:45a-20: dge ba thams cad 'dus pas dge 'dun dkon mchog dang /
T02D2265:45a-21: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i ngang las /
T02D2265:45a-22: chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong shar du
T02D2265:45a-23: rung bas chos dkon mchog blo las 'das shing bsam
T02D2265:45a-25: rnam par rtog pa thams cad sangs shing de kho na nyid kyi don rgyas shing 'byung bas /
T02D2265:45a-26: sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang gsum ni /
T02D2265:45a-27: rang la gsal zhing nye ba yin pa la /
T02D2265:45a-28: de ltar ma rtogs pas dran rig gi sgom pa la /
T02D2265:45a-29: dkon mchog gsum la nye bas ni 'khor ba gsum las thar pa med pas /
T02D2265:45a-30: gsal ba spangs nas srid pa dag tu 'gro //
T02D2265:45a-31: de yang dran pa la gnyis gnyis te /
T02D2265:45a-32: dge ba'i las ka byas na mtho ris gnas gsum thob la /
T02D2265:45a-33: mi dge ba bcu spyad na ngan song gnas gsum du 'gro bas /
T02D2265:45a-34: cha yod nyes kyang mi dge ba la spyod pa dang 'dra bar /
T02D2265:45a-35: bla ma dam pas yid la ma byas pa'i don
T02D2265:45a-36: bstan nas yid la byed pa'i chos la 'bad pa
T02D2265:45a-37: ni / dper na me'i dong mthong bzhin du /
T02D2265:45a-38: me dong du mchongs pa dang 'dra bas /
T02D2265:45b-0: mthong @45b bzhin du dong du 'gro ba las /
T02D2265:45b-1: de lta bu'i gang zag de las snying rje ba'i gnas med de /
T02D2265:45b-2: snying rje byas nas chos la bcug kyang /
T02D2265:45b-4: rkyen bral gsum gyi don bstan kyang rkyen gsum gyi steng du 'gro bas /
T02D2265:45b-5: de las snying rje ba ni ci zhig yod /
T02D2265:45b-7: // / da ni rmongs pa las kyi phyag rgya la chags pa'i dpe ni /
T02D2265:45b-8: skyes bu g-yen pas k'a ma r'u pa'i gtam 'dri ba lta bu ni /
T02D2265:45b-9: spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni /
T02D2265:45b-10: yi ge ham dkar po mgo thur du bstan pa cig nas /
T02D2265:45b-11: mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo na /
T02D2265:45b-12: yi ge ae ser po gyen la blta ba cig gnas /
T02D2265:45b-13: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na yi ge h'um sngon po mgo thur du bstan pa cig gnas /
T02D2265:45b-14: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na /
T02D2265:45b-15: yi ge aa dmar po mgo gyen la blta ba cig gnas /
T02D2265:45b-16: de ltar na 'khor lo bzhi la /
T02D2265:45b-17: spyi bo mgrin pa kha sbyor snying ga dang lte ba gnyis kha sbyor du byas te /
T02D2265:45b-18: thig le dkar po ba thag tsam cig gis 'khor lo bzhi rim gyis gang nas /
T02D2265:45b-19: de'i bde ba la bsgoms nas chags pa'am /
T02D2265:45b-20: las kyi phyag rgya'i shes rab ma dang kha sbyor du byas nas /
T02D2265:45b-21: lus lha'i 'du shes sems chos kyi 'du shes ngag sngags kyi 'du shes byas te /
T02D2265:45b-25: gnas su bskyal ba'i bde ba la chags pas /
T02D2265:45b-26: kha sbyor ba de la yongs su chags nas ni /
T02D2265:45b-27: bde ba de ni don dam pa ma yin zhing zag pa dang bcas pa yin te /
T02D2265:45b-31: dus nyi tshe ba yin te /
T02D2265:45b-32: de yang rgyu mchil ma dang /
T02D2265:45b-33: snabs la sogs pa la mi skye ba'i phyir /
T02D2265:45b-34: gnas rdo rje padma ma yin pa /
T02D2265:45b-35: gzhan nas mi skye ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2265:45b-36: dus rdo rje dang padma 'dzom pa'i dus ma yin
T02D2265:45b-37: pa gzhan du mi skye bas byas pa'i chos can
T02D2265:45b-38: 'gyur ba can glo bur ba yin te /
T02D2265:45b-39: de'i phyir don dam pa ma yin pa la /
T02D2265:45b-40: don dam par rmongs pa rnams 'dzin pa'i phyir /
T02D2265:45b-41: 'di nyid don dam yin zhes rmongs pa smras //
T02D2265:45b-42: don dam pa zhes bya ba ni dus gsum 'du
T02D2265:45b-43: bral du med pa'i yid la mi byed pa'i dbyings
T02D2265:45b-44: te / de'i ngang la dran pa'i sprul pa shar nas /
T02D2265:46a-1: pa'i 'khor lo bzhi sgom pa dang /
T02D2265:46a-2: dran pa'i rdo rje padma las 'du 'phro las mngon
T02D2265:46a-3: du zhen nas thar pa thob tu re ba ni
T02D2265:46a-4: / dper na khyim na rang la yod pa'i ka ca bzhag nas /
T02D2265:46a-5: sgo na med pa tshol ba dang 'dra bas /
T02D2265:46a-6: gang zhig khyim nas byung nas sgo drung du //
T02D2265:46a-7: las kyi phyag rgya'i kha sbyor gyi bde ba la chags pa ni /
T02D2265:46a-8: dper na skyes bu shin du g-yem pa cig gis /
T02D2265:46a-10: sgor song grogs po kun la g-yem pa'i gtam byas pas bde ba skyes nas /
T02D2265:46a-11: de la 'dod chags kyi re ba byed pa bzhin du /
T02D2265:46a-12: mtshan bcas kyi bde bas dam pa'i bde ba ma
T02D2265:46a-13: rnyed par byas pa'i chos la mngon par 'bad pas
T02D2265:46a-14: / khams gsum las mi thar te k'a ma 'dod pa'i khams dang /
T02D2265:46a-16: aa r'u pa gzugs med pa'i khams yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2265:46a-17: k'a ma r'u pa'i gtam ni 'dri bar byed /
T02D2265:46a-19: // / da ni rmongs pa rlung la chags pa'i dpe ni /
T02D2265:46a-20: gdung bas rgyal bar byed pa lta bus bstan te /
T02D2265:46a-21: de yang rlung gi rnal 'byor pas steng rlung bsdams /
T02D2265:46a-22: 'og rlung gyen la 'then nas lus sbyang ba lta bu stong sang nge bar 'bad pas bsgoms te /
T02D2265:46a-23: stong pa de'i khyim du bde ba bsgoms pas /
T02D2265:46a-24: rlung gi rgyu la stong pa'i khyim du ni //
T02D2265:46a-25: bde ba'i bsgom lugs ni rtsa la la n'a dang /
T02D2265:46a-26: ra sa n'a'i rlung gnyis bsdams nas /
T02D2265:46a-27: dbus kyi aa wa dh'u t'i ra rlung phra mo khab tsam pa dmar po cig bcug nas /
T02D2265:46a-28: des spyi bo nas byang chub sems dkar po bab nas /
T02D2265:46a-29: nyams myong gi bde ba skye ba ni /
T02D2265:46a-30: thabs rnam pa mang po'i sgo nas bcos ma yin pa /
T02D2265:46a-31: bcos ma ni 'dus byas yin pas mi grol te de'i phyir /
T02D2265:46a-32: rnam pa du ma'i tshul gyis bcos ma pas /
T02D2265:46a-33: yang na lus nam mkha' ltar stong par bsgoms nas /
T02D2265:46a-34: sems thig le dkar po byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bsgoms nas /
T02D2265:46a-35: zag pa dang bcas pa'i bde ba skyes pa de
T02D2265:46a-36: la don dam par 'dzin pa ni sgom pa nyes
T02D2265:46a-38: nam mkha' lus babs nyes pa dang bcas pa'i /
T02D2265:46a-39: zag pa dang bcas pa'i bde ba la gdung ba bskyed nas re ba byas te /
T02D2265:46b-1: rgyal bar gyur par 'dod pa rnal 'byor pa ni bcos ma yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2265:46b-2: gdung bas rgyal bar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o /
T02D2265:46b-4: // / da ni 'dres pa'i dpe 'gal ba re ba
T02D2265:46b-5: dang bcas pa'i dpe bram ze'i sbyin sreg dang mi
T02D2265:46b-6: 'gal ba don gyi sbyin sreg bstan te /
T02D2265:46b-7: dper na bram ze sbyin sreg byed pa'i rdzas ni /
T02D2265:46b-8: mar dang 'bras dang til sreg pa'o //
T02D2265:46b-10: skye ba med pa'i thab khung du dran pa'i til dang /
T02D2265:46b-11: stong pa'i mar dang snang ba'i 'bras la sogs pa sreg pa'i phyir /
T02D2265:46b-12: ji ltar bram ze mar dang 'bras kyis su //
T02D2265:46b-13: de yang bram zes dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su shing bcer nas me sbar nas /
T02D2265:46b-14: rdzas gong ma bsregs nas sdig pa sreg par 'dod na ni /
T02D2265:46b-15: phyi'i sbyin sreg yin la lte bar gtum mo'i rang bzhin spang nas /
T02D2265:46b-16: rnam par rtog pa sreg par 'dod pa ni nang gi sbyin sreg go //
T02D2265:46b-17: snying gar lha'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas /
T02D2265:46b-18: kha hom khung du byas lag pa gnyis dgang gzar blugs gzar du byas te /
T02D2265:46b-19: kha zas sreg rdzas su byas nas /
T02D2265:46b-20: snying gar yi dam gyi lha mnyes par sems pa ni gsang ba'i sbyin sreg go //
T02D2265:46b-21: blo las 'das pa'i thab khung du blos byas pa sna tshogs sreg rdzas su dbul ba ni /
T02D2265:46b-22: de kho na nyid kyi sbyin sreg yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D2265:46b-23: ;'bar ba'i me la sbyin sreg rdzas su byas nas /
T02D2265:46b-24: de yang bram ze'i bsam pa ni bdag nyid kyang nam mkha' stong par bsgom /
T02D2265:46b-25: rdzas rnams kyang stong par bsgoms nas /
T02D2265:46b-27: nam mkha' lta bu'i stong pa nyid kyi lha dang /
T02D2265:46b-28: sreg rdzas kyi bcud kyis mnyes nas grol ba thob zer /
T02D2265:46b-29: don gyi dbang du byas na /
T02D2265:46b-30: nam mkha' ni stong pa yin la rdzas kyi bcud ni snang ba yin te /
T02D2265:46b-31: gnyis ka bsam du med pa'i dbyings su bskyed cing thim par byed pas /
T02D2265:46b-32: nam mkha'i bcud kyi rdzas ni skyed par byed pa ste /
T02D2265:46b-34: byas pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ni 'khor ba nyid du zhen par byed pa yin la /
T02D2265:46b-35: don gyi sbyin sreg rtogs na /
T02D2265:46b-36: chos nyid kyi dbyings dang bral du med par zhen pas /
T02D2265:46b-37: 'di de nyid du zhen par shes pa yin /
T02D2265:47a-0: // / da ni bcos ma'i rnal 'byor bzhad gang @47a * //
T02D2265:47a-2: de la spyi bor he ru ka yab yum sbyor ba byas pa las /
T02D2265:47a-3: lte ba nas gtum mo spar nas byang chub sems phab ste /
T02D2265:47a-4: tshangs pa'i bu ga na mar zhugs pa las /
T02D2265:47a-5: bde ba skyes pa la don dam pa yin zer ba ni bcos ma yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2265:47a-6: kha cig tshang pa'i gnas su 'od sbar nas /
T02D2265:47a-7: de'i dus su rang gi lce rkan la brud pa g-ya' ba'am za ba'i bde ba cig 'byung ste /
T02D2265:47a-8: de yang don dam pa yin zer bas /
T02D2265:47a-9: lce ni kun du ru'i lce cung bskyod //
T02D2265:47a-10: de lta bu'i bde ba de ni zag pa dang
T02D2265:47a-11: bcas pa'i bde ba bcos ma yin pas 'khor ba
T02D2265:47a-13: don ma yin pa la don du bzung bas /
T02D2265:47a-14: don gyi sems skrag par byed pas /
T02D2265:47a-15: 'chi bar byed shin tu dkrugs par byed de /
T02D2265:47a-16: dbang gi rten 'brel las byung ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ba de la /
T02D2265:47a-17: nga rgyal dbang gis don dam pa yin zer te /
T02D2265:47a-18: de ni bcos ma'i rnal 'byor pa yin pas /
T02D2265:47a-19: nga rgyal dbang gis rnal 'byor pa zhes zer /
T02D2265:47a-21: // / da ni 'gal ba nyams myong gzhan la ston pa /
T02D2265:47a-22: mching bu dang margad kyi dpes bstan par bya ste /
T02D2265:47a-23: dran pa rig pas bsgoms pa'i thig le dang /
T02D2265:47a-24: gtum mo dang lha dang lha mo'i dal la sogs pa'i nyams su myong ba'i bde ba de la /
T02D2265:47a-25: rang gis don dam par byas nas /
T02D2265:47a-26: rang gi nyams myong de rig pa dang sbyar nas /
T02D2265:47a-28: rang rig de nyid rig pa gzhan la ltos //
T02D2265:47a-29: dran pa'i bsam bsgom la sogs pa la ji tsam cig kyang 'bad nas grol byar te /
T02D2265:47a-30: de ni rang gis rang bcings pa yin te /
T02D2265:47a-31: dper na dar gyi srin bu rang gi kha chus bcings pa bzhin no //
T02D2265:47a-32: des na 'ching ba'i rgyu la grol ba'i rgyu 'dod pa ni /
T02D2265:47a-33: mi mkhas pa'i gang zag yin te dper na mi
T02D2265:47a-34: khong nad can la bu ram dang bca' sga btang
T02D2265:47a-35: na phan / phyis mi chus khyer ba la yang
T02D2265:47a-36: bu ram dang bcas pa'i bca' sga thong dang phan
T02D2265:47a-38: de'i phyir gang gis bcings pa de nyid grol zhes zer /
T02D2265:47a-39: dper na rin po che margad tshol ba la /
T02D2265:47a-40: nor bu mching bu btsal nas 'dra bar mthong ste /
T02D2265:47b-0: @47b de ni kha dog dang dbyibs 'dra yang yon tan mi 'dra ba'o //
T02D2265:47b-1: de bzhin du sems nyid kyi dangs ma dran med skye med blo 'das gsum ni /
T02D2265:47b-2: rin po che margad lta bu dang sems las byung
T02D2265:47b-3: ba'i dran pa dang rig pa mching bu lta bu
T02D2265:47b-4: gnyis te / 'dra 'dra 'dra ste yon tan mi 'dra ba'i phyir ;
T02D2265:47b-5: kha dog dbye bas mching bu margad zer //
T02D2265:47b-6: rmongs pas rin po che ngo ma shes pas /
T02D2265:47b-7: mching bu la rin po che byas pas /
T02D2265:47b-8: rin ma khugs pa dang 'dra bar /
T02D2265:47b-9: ma go ba rnams kyis sems nyid dangs ma yid
T02D2265:47b-10: la byar ma btub pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T02D2265:47b-11: dbyings dang ; sems las byung ba'i dran rig rtog pa'i rgyu gnyis ngo ma shes pas /
T02D2265:47b-12: rmongs pas rin chen brtag pa ma shes pas /
T02D2265:47b-14: // / da ni nyams myong la don dam du 'dzin pa'i dper gan lta bus ston te /
T02D2265:47b-15: dper na nor bu ngo ma shes pas ra gan la gser du byed ;
T02D2265:47b-16: gser la ra gan du mthong ba bzhin du chos
T02D2265:47b-17: nyid ma bcos pa blos ma reg pa de la
T02D2265:47b-19: don du mi 'dzin dran pa'i rnam rtog gi chos
T02D2265:47b-20: spros pa dang byas pa'i chos la don dam par
T02D2265:47b-21: 'dzin pas / de ni ra gan gser gyi blo yis len //
T02D2265:47b-22: de yang dran pa'i chos snang stong dang /
T02D2265:47b-25: thig le gnyis shor gnyis mnyam gyi /
T02D2265:47b-26: nyams su myong ba'i bde ba la don dam pa zer zhing /
T02D2265:47b-27: de la rtsol sgrub drag tu byed pas /
T02D2265:47b-28: nyams myong khyer nas don dam sgrub par byed //
T02D2265:47b-29: nyams myong bag chags dang bcas pa de ni ;
T02D2265:47b-31: dper na rmi lam gyi dus su skyes pa la
T02D2265:47b-32: chags pa'i 'du shes kyis pha dang ma dang legs
T02D2265:47b-33: pa dang nyes pa slob ste /
T02D2265:47b-34: gnyid sad pa'i dus su gang yang mi bden /
T02D2265:47b-35: de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya'i bde ba dang /
T02D2265:47b-36: rtsa dang gtum mo la sogs pa'i bde ba la chags /
T02D2265:47b-37: bcos ma yin pa'i 'jig pa'i phyir //
T02D2265:47b-38: rmi lam bde la rjes su chags par byed //
T02D2265:47b-39: yid las byas pa'i chos thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra bar ni ma rtogs pas /
T02D2265:47b-40: dran rig gi bde ba zag pa dang bcas pa la mngon par zhen nas /
T02D2265:48a-1: pa'i dus su sems bde ba dang 'grogs zer ba te /
T02D2265:48a-2: de ni phung po mi rtag pa la brten pa rtag pa mi srid de /
T02D2265:48a-3: chos can dbang che ba'i phyir /
T02D2265:48a-4: phung po mi rtag bde ba rtag ces zer /
T02D2265:48a-6: // / da ni 'dres pa'i dpe 'gal ba'i dpe /
T02D2265:48a-7: ae wam la chags pa me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /
T02D2265:48a-8: mi 'gal ba don gyi ae wam don gyi phyag rgya bzhis bstan par bya ste /
T02D2265:48a-9: de yang shes rab ma'i mkha' chos kyi 'byung gnas /
T02D2265:48a-10: ae gru gsum du yod pa de la /
T02D2265:48a-11: thabs kyi rdo rje wam gyi tshul du gnas te sbyor ba byas pas /
T02D2265:48a-12: bde ba dang stong pa'i ngos zin te /
T02D2265:48a-13: de yang bde ba'i gnas su mi snang ba la /
T02D2265:48a-14: de'i mtshan nyid yid la ma byas pa'i stong pas
T02D2265:48a-15: rgyas btab ste snad stong dbyer med pa ni zung
T02D2265:48a-16: 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa ste /

T02D2265:48a-20: rig pa la stong pas rgyas btab par go bar byed pa ni stong pa'o /

T02D2265:48a-23: mi 'gal ba don gyi ae wam ni /

T02D2265:48a-32: ae wam yi ges rang nyid go bar byed //

T02D2265:48a-35: kha nang du bltas pas dga' ba bzhi ngos bzung ste /

T02D2265:48b-0: @48b don gyi dbang du byas na /

T02D2265:49b-30: skye med longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gnyis ka /

T02D2265:55a-4: nyon mongs pa lngas kyang bcings pa med pas /
T02D2265:55a-5: de yang de yis ci phyir 'ching //
T02D2265:55a-6: de ltar dpe nyi shu rtsa gsum gyis gzhung gi don rnams ma lus par bstan nas /
T02D2265:55a-7: da ni mtshan gyi don bstan par bya ste /
T02D2265:55a-8: gnyug ma rnal ma lhan cig skyes pa dang ma bral ba'i dbyings su /
T02D2265:55a-9: dus gsum dang khams gsum thams cad 'byor cing /
T02D2265:55a-10: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir /
T02D2265:55a-11: rnal 'byor gyi don dam pa blo las 'das pa'i dbyings su mnga' brnyes shing /
T02D2265:55a-12: khams gsum sku gsum du bsgyur bar mdzad cing /
T02D2265:55a-13: ma h'a mu dra'i don khong du chud pas /
T02D2265:55a-15: chos thams cad gnyis su med par ston pa dang /
T02D2265:55a-16: bde ba chen por ston ba dang /
T02D2265:55a-17: bri ba dang bral bar ston pa dang /
T02D2265:55a-18: bri ba dang gang ba med par ston par mdzad pas dpal sa ra ha'o //
T02D2265:55a-19: de lta bu'i don rnams sangs rgyas nas da lta'i
T02D2265:55a-20: bar du brgyud pa rgyun ma chad par ma 'ongs
T02D2265:55a-21: pa'i don du gdams ngag tu mdzad pas zhal snga
T02D2265:55a-22: nas mdzad pa / gang mdzad na gnyis snang ma lus pa bcom nas /
T02D2265:55a-23: gnyis snang la bka' bskyon pa dang /
T02D2265:55a-24: mi slu ba'i chos nyid bri ba dang gang ba med pa mgur du bzhengs pa de /
T02D2265:55a-25: rgya rim pa bdun gyis btab nas shin tu rub pa'i don /
T02D2265:55a-26: spros bcas dang spros med shin tu spros med gsum las /
T02D2265:55a-27: 'di ni shin tu spros med du mdzad ba dang /
T02D2265:55a-28: dran pa'i yid thams cad dran med kyi ngang du yid 'phrog par byed pas /
T02D2265:55a-29: do ha mdzod ces bya ba spyod pa'i glu /
T02D2265:55a-30: chos nyid kyi don brda dang thabs ma lus pa'i
T02D2265:55a-31: sgo nas gtan la phab pa rdzogs so zhes bya
T02D2265:55a-33: dus gsum bde gshegs dgongs pa blo yi spyod yul ma yin yang //
T02D2265:55a-34: mnyam pa nyid kyi thugs rjes sems can kun la khyab par mdzad //
T02D2265:55a-35: re dogs med pa'i sku gsum lhun grub 'khor ba
T02D2265:55a-36: rang bzhin dag /'bad rtsol bral ba'i rtog pa rang
T02D2265:55a-37: rgyud grol ba snying po'i don //
T02D2265:55b-0: dran pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i spyod yul ma yin @55b don dang ring //
T02D2265:55b-1: rang bzhin gnas lugs don la sems can sangs rgyas ma grub pa //
T02D2265:55b-2: ri khrod byams mgon badzra p'a ni thugs las bdag gis rnyed //
T02D2265:55b-3: skye med bde chen smyon pa'i ngag la bden par gang 'dzin pa //
T02D2265:55b-4: tshig dang don la 'brel med brda don cung zhig brtsams pa 'dis //
T02D2265:55b-5: khams gsum ma lus dran pa'i 'od 'bar sku gsum
T02D2265:55b-6: thob par shog / do ha mdzod ces bya ba'i
T02D2265:55b-7: spyod pa'i glu'i 'grel ba don gyi sgron ma zhes
T02D2265:55b-8: bya ba / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
T02D2265:55b-9: skye med bde chen gyi zhal snga nas mdzad par
